fullText:
Swirling Leaves of Autumn

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Warlock, Fey Pact class feature, must worship Sehanine
Benefit: When your Misty Step pact boon triggers, the square you leave and each square adjacent to it become lightly obscured until the start of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 386, page(s) 70.
name: Swirling Leaves of Autumn
prerequisite: Warlock, Fey Pact class feature, must worship Sehanine
benefit: When your Misty Step pact boon triggers, the square you leave and each square adjacent to it become lightly obscured until the start of your next turn.
